casebody.data:
Michelle KISH, Employee,
v.
FRYE REGIONAL MEDICAL CENTER, Employer, Self-insured (Sedgwick Claims Management Services, Inc., Third-Party Administrator) No. 180P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018. William D. Acton, Jr., Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Kish, Michelle. John F. Morris, Attorney at Law, Daniel O'Shea, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Frye Regional Medical Center, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 18th of June 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
